Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Detroit ace Tarik Skubal in the fifth inning.
Emmanuel Clase struck out Kerry Carpenter to end the eighth inning.
Hunter Gaddis struck out Kerry Carpenter with bases loaded in the sixth inning.
Eli Morgan struck out two batters in the seventh inning.
Emmanuel Clase got the final six outs to secure the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Guardians manager Stephen Vogt emphasized the importance of confidence and the team's approach to winning.
Post-Match Reflections: José Ramírez expressed the team's desire to win for the city.
Stephen Vogt reflected on the team's resilience and approach throughout the season.
Emmanuel Clase expressed confidence in his ability to perform in high-pressure moments.
Detroit manager A.J. Hinch expressed heartbreak over the season's abrupt end.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians celebrated their victory with champagne and beer in the clubhouse.
The Guardians' bullpen, known for its strength, showed some wear and tear but managed to secure the win.
The Guardians will face the New York Yankees in the AL Championship Series.
